Steps.Message: Update at 15:28 - This is Rob from the messaging team at UK Power Networks. Thanks for bearing with us this afternoon, I just wanted to advise the latest from our teams on site. They have advised that the majority of power to the area has been restored safely, as it's only now necessary for a small number of properties to remain without power while we make repairs. If your power is back on, send CANCEL to 80876 to stop SMS updates. Otherwise, our staff have advised the issue with our overhead cabling is very close to scaffolding, which is complicating the repairs and so they have offered an estimated timeframe of 19:30-20:30 for power to be restored. I'm sorry for the length of time this may take, but I'll keep you updated with all of our progress.

We became aware of a power cut at 12:50. We’re sorry for any disruption this may have caused you. We didn’t know in advance there would be a power cut but now that we know, our teams will do everything they can to get your power back quickly.
Steps.Name: Power cut reported

Steps.Message: We have engineers on their way. As this is affecting your area, they will not need to attend your property. Rest assured once they arrive, they’ll work as quickly as is safely possible to get your power back on.
Steps.Name: Engineers on their way

Steps.Message: Engineers are now on site, carrying out investigations into the fault. Once they have completed their assessment, they will carry out repairs.
Steps.Name: Engineers investigating and fixing

Logs.Comment: Update at 15:28 - This is Rob from the messaging team at UK Power Networks. Thanks for bearing with us this afternoon, I just wanted to advise the latest from our teams on site. They have advised that the majority of power to the area has been restored safely, as it's only now necessary for a small number of properties to remain without power while we make repairs. If your power is back on, send CANCEL to 80876 to stop SMS updates. Otherwise, our staff have advised the issue with our overhead cabling is very close to scaffolding, which is complicating the repairs and so they have offered an estimated timeframe of 19:30-20:30 for power to be restored. I'm sorry for the length of time this may take, but I'll keep you updated with all of our progress.

IncidentCategoryCustomerFriendlyDescript: We were investigating an overhead electricity line fault which caused a power cut in the local area.
